name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xbase extension: Search and download your X data

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xbase extension is a free tool to backup and organize your X data. Download your posts, bookmarks, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you have any suggestions, please email them to our team at team@xbase.so.
long.ja,ko:
Here's how it works:

1. Bookmark your favorite tweets 📌
2. Organize bookmarks with spaces 🏷️
3. Mark bookmarks as Done ✅ and keep track of your progress. 📈

Happy Collecting! 

Proudly backed by Primer.kr

**NEW** UPDATE

🆕 We are renaming tags to spaces. In the next version, you will be able to organize tweets by dragging and dropping into space. 

🆕 You can now favorite spaces! Right click the spaces and you will see the option to favorite 

🆕 We moved the inbox from the center to the left bar and removed done tab. We will add back tabs in the center when we add note-taking! 

🆕 We added a clear button so you can mark all tweets done more easily too.
